name: "Lengths & Limits" (LP)
description:
* Our first full length. There are very few physical copies are left.

RELEASE DATE: Nov. 27th, 2007 Makeout Party- “Lengths & Limits” will be released on November 27th through Make Music Collective. The follow-up to “Something to Make You Stay” features 11 brand new songs which return the band to their emo roots, bringing to mind classic Cap’n Jazz and Texas is the Reason. The quartet’s first LP will prove to be a more mature step in their growth as a band, and expands on the style they’ve been building for themselves since forming in late 2004. Recorded with producer Jesse Goins only 6 months after releasing their debut, “Lengths & Limits” touches on the truely emo sound of the late 90’s, the sound that was here one year and gone the next. Tracklisting is as follows: 1. Sparks 2. Back To Your Ways 3. Conditional Needs 4. Lengths & Limits 5. General Sherman Lost His Arm 6. Cut Two Years 7. Left You Behind 8. Are We Sinking? 9. Don’t Hold Your Breath 10. When You Find It, Let Me Know 11. 11/97

name: "Carried Names" EP (2009)
description:
New EP released May 22, 2009. Recorded with Steve Poponi at the Gradwell House in Haddon Heights, NJ. Track listing as follows:

1. Your Mid-Twenties Relapse

2. ...Restore

3. The Worst 4th of July Ever

4. A Year Plus One Month

5. 7 Durant

6. Carried Names

**ALL physical copies of "Carried Names" are now sold out! It's available digitally via iTunes.
